mapper.insert: insert into Post(uID, postTitle, postContent, tags) values (#{uID}, #{postTitle}, #{postContent}, #{tags})
mapper.update: update Post set postTitle=#{postTitle}, postContent=#{postContent} where postID=#{postID}
mapper.select: select postID, hitNum, postDate, postTitle, postContent from Post where postID > 0 order by postID desc, postDate desc
